00025 template <class BaseClass>
00026 class TNamedWrap: virtual public BaseClass
00027 {
00028 public:
00029        // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::INamed)
00030        virtual const istd::CString& GetName() const;
00031        virtual void SetName(const istd::CString& name);
00032        virtual bool IsNameFixed() const;
00033 
00034 protected:
00035        virtual bool SerializeName(iser::IArchive& archive);
00036 
00037 protected:
00038        istd::CString m_name;
00039 };
00040 
00041 
00042 // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::INamed)
00043 
00044 template <class BaseClass>
00045 const istd::CString& TNamedWrap<BaseClass>::GetName() const
00046 {
00047        return m_name;
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00051 template <class BaseClass>
00052 void TNamedWrap<BaseClass>::SetName(const istd::CString& name)
00053 {
00054        if (m_name != name){
00055               istd::CChangeNotifier changePtr(this);
00056 
00057               m_name = name;
00058        }
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 template <class BaseClass>
00063 bool TNamedWrap<BaseClass>::IsNameFixed() const
00064 {
00065        return false;
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 // protected members
00070 
00071 template <class BaseClass>
00072 bool TNamedWrap<BaseClass>::SerializeName(iser::IArchive& archive)
00073 {
00074        static iser::CArchiveTag nameTag("Name", "Object name");
00075 
00076        bool retVal = archive.BeginTag(nameTag);
00077        retVal = retVal && archive.Process(m_name);
00078        retVal = retVal && archive.EndTag(nameTag);
00079 
00080        return retVal;
00081 }
